wire.description: Allows access to all wire library functions

chip.description: Allows access to all chip-based wire functions

adjust.description: Allows the user to adjust the chip's inputs and outputs

input.description: Allows the user to adjust the chip's inputs

output.description: Allows the user to adjust the chip's outputs

IO.description: Allows the user to read and write to the input and output tables

input.description: Allows the user to read a value of an input

output.description: Allows the user to write a value of an output

wirelink.description: Allows the user to read and write a wirelink

read.description: Allows the user to read from a wirelink

write.description: Allows the user to write to a wirelink

entity.description: Allows the user to access entity based wire functions

wire.description: Allows the user to create and delete wires between entities

create.description: Allows the user to create wires between entities

delete.description: Allows the user to delete wires between entities

get.description: Allows the user to get the names of inputs and outputs on an entity

input.description: Allows the user to get the names of an entities' inputs

output.description: Allows the user to get the names of an entities' outputs
